name: firefoxfullscreen
title: fullscreen tool
description:
Turn Firefox in full screen after a set interval. 
 Also hides the main toolbar. At any point of time, to show the toolbar
 press alt-shift-s.
author: victortheleon@gmail.com

preferences.description: How many seconds to repeat the incident.
preferences.name: repeatInterval
preferences.title: Repeat Interval( in seconds )
